meanings.definition: A person or company that develops photographs.
meanings.sent1: The photofinishers at the store always do a great job developing my pictures.
meanings.sent2: I dropped off my film at the photofinishers to get my vacation photos developed.
meanings.sent3: The photofinishers must have magical powers to make my blurry photos look clear!
meanings.sent4: The photofinishers are like wizards turning blank paper into memories.
meanings.sent5: The photofinishers bring life to my captured moments with their skills.

meanings.sent1: The photofinishers involves carefully handling the film to create beautiful images.
meanings.sent2: I learned about the photofinishers in my photography class.
meanings.sent3: Watching the photofinishers work is like seeing a magic show with photos as the tricks.
meanings.sent4: The photofinishers is like a secret recipe that turns negatives into positives.
meanings.sent5: The photofinishers is a delicate dance of chemicals and light to bring pictures to life.
